price: Ẹ̀yin tí ẹ gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo, ẹ gbógun ti àwọn tó súnmọ́ yín nínú àwọn aláìgbàgbọ́; kí wọ́n rí ìlekoko lára yín. Kí ẹ sì mọ̀ pé dájúdájú Allāhu wà pẹ̀lú àwọn olùbẹ̀rù (Rẹ̀).
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ قَٰتِلُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ يَلُونَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ وَلۡيَجِدُواْ فِيكُمۡ غِلۡظَةٗۚ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū qātilū alladhīna yalūnakum mina al-kufāri walyajidū fīkum ghil'ẓatan wa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha maʿa al-mutaqīna
